text: Ðis synd þa landgemæru to hal hagan wudes & feldes<../images/tbar.gif>is ærest æt þæs bernes ende æt þæs wæteres sprynge.
Æfter þam wætere into hallinga homme.
Of þam homme into rames cumbe.
Æfter þam grenan wege into þære mylnstige.
Of þære mylen stige into cyles dene to þam haran stane.
Of þam stane into scobbe stane.
Of scobbe stane suþ to þam lytlan beorge.
And swa suþ ofer turcendene into þam crum dæle.
Of þam crum dæle suþ & west to þære ealdan dic.
And II æceras wið utan.
And swa west wið þan heafdan.
<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð to þære ealdan dune.
Andlang dune west<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymeð into dina more.
Of dina more into hehstanes pytte.
Of hehstanes pytte eastward east weard bi þam heafdan to þam hæðenan byrigelse wiþ heallinga weallan.
Swa east ofer þa sealt stræt.
To þam crundælan.
Of þam crundælan bi þam heafdan.
To þæs bernes ende.
Ðis is þæs wudes gemære ærest of hram broces forda svþ<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymeþ to þam slæde.
Of þam slæde þæt hit cymþ to bacga slæde.
Of þam slæde<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymeð up to þam hrycge.
Of þam hrycge west þæt hit cymeþ to þam lytlan sceagan.
And swa west ofer þa salt stræte.
To þæs wudes efese west swa þæt hit cumeð to þære hwitan dic.
And swa adun ofer þa ecge<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð to crimes hylle.
Of grimes hylle<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymþ to sponwælle hæfdan.
And swa west<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð to þære bradan ac.
Of þære bradan ac<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð to þære wohgan apeldran.
Þanon norð rihte<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymeþ to þære haran apeldran to þam broke.
Æfter þam broce<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð to þam gemyþan.
Of þam gemyþan eastriht<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymeþ to Buddinc wican eastrihte.
Swa ut of þam wudu.
Of þæs wudes efese.
<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymeþ to sibbe stapele.
Of sibbe stapole æfter þam slæde<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymeþ to þeofa dene.
And swa eastriht be þam wuda.
<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymeð to mær apeldran.
And swa æfter þa norðmæstan port weig.
<../images/tbar.gif>hit cymð eft into ramforda.
Ðis his þa londgemæra of halhegan into wontes forda.
Of wontes forda in wontes dic.
Of wontes dic in Ceor.
Of þa Ceore in cisburne.
Of cisburne in cattes stycc.
Of cattes stycce in grene weg onlong þæs grene weges in þreom ac.
Of þreom ac.
In gundes stige.
Of gundes stige in neowe heg.
Æfter þæm neowe hege þæt cyme in laure.
Æfter laure<../images/tbar.gif>cyme in lauric.
Æfter lauric<../images/tbar.gif>cyme in balde næsces ford.
Of balde næsces forde in þa wærriht ac.
Of<../images/tbar.gif>wærriht ac bi<../images/tbar.gif>wadlond.
Of þa wadlonde in gearri ford.
Of gearri ford in bradi burne.
Of brade burne in þa alde dic.
Of þære alde dic in sice æt halheogan betweonen griman & halheogan in wær legan.
Of pærlega in sæferne stream.
Ðis synd þa londgemæra in halheogan on west half sæferne.
